title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit, a Parents' Choice Gold Award winner in the Science & Engineering category. This intermediate-level kit comes in a vibrant blue color and contains 285 pieces to build 20 different models.

The kit includes an illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide with 36 pages of detailed instructions. It covers various learning concepts such as force, load, compression, tension, mechanical physics, and structural engineering. The experiments are designed to teach you about the strength and stability of structures, the strength and stiffness of materials, and optimization for safety and cost.

This kit allows you to explore different structural elements like columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary. You'll also learn about various force types, including tension, compression, shear, and bending.

The kit includes a series of 20 model-building experiments where you can construct different types of bridges such as truss bridges, arch bridges, cantilever bridges, rope bridges, and suspension bridges. This kit is a fantastic way to learn about the fascinating world of structural engineering while having fun.
